price: 93. Kino tango akomaki kati ya ndelo ezwami na kati ya ngomba mibale akuti sima na yango bato baye bazali kososola maloba ya bato misusu te.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ بَيۡنَ ٱلسَّدَّيۡنِ وَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمَا قَوۡمٗا لَّا يَكَادُونَ يَفۡقَهُونَ قَوۡلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā balagha bayna al-sadayni wajada min dūnihimā qawman lā yakādūna yafqahūna qawlan
